item.description:
Hello Boston Volunteers,

 

An opportunity to farm within the city!

We will be working with Northampton Square Rooftop Gardens, which grows a variety of nutritionally rich produce to donate to a city food pantry. We may be involved with fall seeding/transplanting/adding cover crop or whatever task needs to accomplished on that date. Please bring water and a snack.

Address: 35, Northampton St, Boston, MA, 4th floor

Parking: Available for a fee within the building. Street parking may be available on Mass. avenue, but I have been told it is limited

Public Transport: Orange line to Mass. Avenue. After coming out of the T stop head southwest on SW Corridor Park towards Watson St, slight left onto Northhampton Street (0.7 miles, 14 mins according to google maps). Take the elevator to the 4th floor and ask for rooftop garden.

Dress: Please wear comfortable shoes and clothes that you don't mind getting dirty.

Location: When you arrive at the building, take the elevators up to the fourth floor and walk down the hallway until you see the outdoor farming area.  Feel free to call Danielle if you need directions: 619-306-6606.

Please check out the new website for our popular nonprofit. www.BostonVolunteer.org

Learn more about your fellow Boston Volunteers:

P.S. Please friend Paulette:http://www.facebook.com/paulette.revere.7

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Rooftop Gardening within the city
